import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate, useSearchParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { getPriceQueryParams } from "../helpers/helpers"; const Filters = () => { const [min, setMin] = useState(0); const [max, setMax] = useState(0); const navigate = useNavigate(); let [searchParams] = useSearchParams(); const handleButtonClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); searchParams = getPriceQueryParams(searchParams, "min", min); searchParams = getPriceQueryParams(searchParams, "max", max); const path = window.location.pathname + "?" + searchParams.toString(); navigate(path); }; return (

Filters

Price
setMin(e.target.value)} />
setMax(e.target.value)} />
Category
Ratings
); }; export default Filters;
